reviews.text: Bumble Bee Blinds of Greater Dallas Area 4480 Alpha Rd suite 112, Farmers Branch, TX 75244 Custom doesn’t mean complicated - not when we guide YOU the whole way. Your home has its own personality. Let’s trade basic blinds for something that complements your light and style. "Great company, quality products and the owners are good people." "If you're looking for quality and trustworthy service, they’re the best choice!" "They gave me pricing options and explained how the install process would work."

I had a great experience with bumblebee blinds. The blinds are of good quality Austin the one that came out and measured and installed was very professionand did a great job. … More Response from the owner 2 months ago Thank you so much for the kind words and recommendation! We’re so glad you had a great experience and are enjoying your new blinds

Such a great experience from start to finish! Lindsay was just amazing and so helpful! She was so patient with us and understood the look we wanted…and that’s what she delivered! We are LOVING our new blinds, shade and shutters! So glad we went with Bumble Bee! We will definitely be referring business to them! Response from the owner 5 days ago Thank you for your review! It was a pleasure working with you.
Love our New Bumble Bee Shutters. The process was easy and the install was seamless! Response from the owner 5 days ago Thank you Stella. The shutters look great!
